Conference Registration

Participants may register on site. To register in advance of the Workshop, complete this form and send a check (in US Dollars) made to the order of  Society for Artificial Intelligence and Statistics in the appropriate amount to:

    David Heckerman
    Microsoft Research
    One Microsoft Way
    Redmond, WA 910052-6399
    USA

Advance registration discounts apply if registration is received by Dec. 1, 1998.

Technical Program -- check one:
regular, by Dec. 1, 1998: $250
student, by Dec. 1, 1998: $150
regular, after Dec. 1, 1998: $300
student, after Dec. 1, 1998: $200
Tutorials (Dumais, Spiegelhalter, Hastie) -- check one:
regular, by Dec. 1, 1998: $75
student, by Dec. 1, 1998: $50
regular, after Dec. 1, 1998: $100
student, after Dec. 1, 1998: $70
   


For questions about content or inputting problems contact: heckermam@microsoft.com
